700482f-a.title: Bronx: Baychester Avenue - Pitman Avenue
700482f-a.text:
Eaychester Avenue (right), east side, south from Pitman Avenue.
May 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
700482f-a.folder: Baychester Avenue & Pitman Avenue, Bronx, NY

701627f-a.title: Bronx: Pitman Avenue - Baychester Avenue
701627f-a.text:
Pitman Avenue, south side, east from Baychester to De Reimer
Avenues.
May 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
701627f-a.folder: Pitman Avenue & Baychester Avenue, Bronx, NY

701628f-a.title: Bronx: Pitman Avenue - Baychester Avenue
701628f-a.text:
Pitman Avenue, north side, east from but not including Baychester
Avenue.
May 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
701628f-a.folder: Pitman Avenue & Baychester Avenue, Bronx, NY

700484f-a.title: Bronx: Baychester Avenue - Pitman Avenue
700484f-a.text:
Baychester Avenue, west side, north from Pitman Avenue.
May 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
700484f-a.folder: Baychester Avenue & Pitman Avenue, Bronx, NY

700483f-a.title: Bronx: Baychester Avenue - Pitman Avenue
700483f-a.text:
Baychester Avenue (left, telephone poles thereon), east side,
north from Pitman Avenue, showing the semi-rural aspect of the area.
On the right are seen the rears of houses facing on De Reimer Avenue.
May 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
700483f-a.folder: Baychester Avenue & Pitman Avenue, Bronx, NY
